member.name: D3D10_TEXTURE3D_DESC.Width
member.summary: Texture width (in texels). The range is from 1 to D3D10_REQ_TEXTURE3D_U_V_OR_W_DIMENSION (2048). For more information about restrictions, see Remarks.

member.name: D3D10_TEXTURE3D_DESC.Height
member.summary: Texture height (in texels). The range is from 1 to D3D10_REQ_TEXTURE3D_U_V_OR_W_DIMENSION (2048). For more information about restrictions, see Remarks.

member.name: D3D10_TEXTURE3D_DESC.Depth
member.summary: Texture depth (in texels). The range is from 1 to D3D10_REQ_TEXTURE3D_U_V_OR_W_DIMENSION (2048).

member.name: D3D10_TEXTURE3D_DESC.MipLevels
member.summary: Number of subtextures (also called mipmap levels). Use 1 for a multisampled texture; or 0 to generate a full set of subtextures.

member.name: D3D10_TEXTURE3D_DESC.Usage
member.summary: Value that identifies how the texture is to be read from and written to. The most common value is D3D10_USAGE-DEFAULT; see for all possible values.

member.name: D3D10_TEXTURE3D_DESC.BindFlags
member.summary: Flags (see ) for binding to pipeline stages. The flags can be combined by a logical OR.

member.name: D3D10_TEXTURE3D_DESC.CPUAccessFlags
member.summary: Flags (see ) to specify the types of CPU access allowed. Use 0 if CPU access is not required. These flags can be combined with a logical OR.

member.name: D3D10_TEXTURE3D_DESC.MiscFlags
member.summary: Flags (see ) that identify other, less common resource options. Use 0 if none of these flags apply. These flags can be combined with a logical OR.
